hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 51 in today's
episode I have a new idiom for you to
get even let's find out what it means
and how you can use it in your daily
conversation to get even when someone
does something or says something that is
wrong or unacceptable it leaves you
feeling hurt in such a situation you
wish to teach them a lesson and make
them realize how you felt because of
what they did so you decide to react in
an equally bad manner just like they did
to get even basically means to do
something equally bad to someone who has
done bad to you it also means to take
revenge or punish someone who did
something wrong to you when you get even
with someone you make them realize what
wrong they did to you and how bad you
felt at their time it could also mean
you are standing up for something wrong
done to you if you play a prank on your
friend who did the same with you earlier
it means you are getting even with him
you are teaching him a lesson by doing
something equally bad to him you often
gain a peace of mind when you get even
with someone you need to alright now
that you know what this idiom means
let's take a look at some example
sentences to see how you can use it in
your daily conversation
example one Mike wants to get even with
pizza for taking over his project while
he was on a vacation example to India
wants to get even with Australia after
losing two consecutive matches to retain
the number one position in the Test
cricket example 3 Peter parked his car
in Toms parking slot and refused to
remove it Tom got even with Peter by
fixing a banana in the exhaust pipe of
his car example 4 little John got even
with his elder sister by writing on her
face with a permanent marker while she
was sleeping example 5 father told jack
don't come home crying always get even
and finish your silly fights at school
example 6 after the store had refused a
replacement for a faulty computer mrs.
Smith complained to the consumer court
to get even example 7 Peter is waiting
for the right opportunity to get even
with Sam for insulting him at the party
example 8 being harassed by the
telemarketing calls William got even by
placing a fake order for one of their
products example 9 the best way to get
even with someone who hurts you is to
forget and forgive example 10 I would
like to share with you an experience
about my neighbor William he got even
with one of his colleague Lisa by
pouring used oil underneath her car each
night as a result she had to spend huge
money to check the oil leak at the
garage time again finally Lisa got tired
and sold her car and bought a new one
just to her surprise even the new car
had a oil leak a few days what a way to
get even with someone that's the end of
today's episode so have you ever got
